decisions.description: Used to check if Location Daily Info from Get_Daily is empty before try assignment.
decisions.name: Check_returned_get_record
decisions.label: Check returned get record

decisions.description: Check if the returned value by getRecord is ok (Daily Info)
decisions.name: Daily_Info_returned_value_is_OK
decisions.label: Daily Info returned value is OK ?

rules.name: Slot_Available
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7)
rules.label: Slot Available

Flow.description: With BR Screen Addition Version 21 is the functioning version (NO MASTER-DETAIL)
Flow.label: Book Slot at Location

fields.name: AdmissionDenied
fields.fieldText:
ADMISSION DENIED.

Please contact your medical doctor if you are feeling ill or seek for advise.

screens.description: You got an error, maybe you can try to choose a different slot.
screens.name: ErrorScreen
screens.label: ErrorScreen

fields.name: errorUpdatingLocationDailyInfo
fields.fieldText:
{!showInfoOnError}


Error while updating Daily Info Record, maybe it is not available

fields.name: thankYouMsg
fields.fieldText:
Thank you!


An email will be sent to you once the request is approved. Please use the attached QR Code to check-in to the office.

fields.name: CheckInText
fields.fieldText: Please complete all of the required data to confirm your visit.

fields.name: PrivacyCompliance
fields.fieldText: In compliance with the Italian legislative Decree no. 196 dated 30/06/2003, I authorize the use and process of my personal details.

fields.name: AreYouOk
fields.fieldText: I am not currently required to self-quarantine

fields.name: theChecks
fields.fieldText: Check all that apply to you

fields.name: High_Risk_Travel
fields.fieldText: I've not travelled to a high risk location

fields.name: UnderApproval
fields.fieldText: Your request is under approval. Please check later for status changes.

fields.name: SlotNotAvailable
fields.fieldText: The slot is no longer available, please select another slot or day.

textTemplates.description: This body is used when an email should be send after a request has been approved WITHOUT manager approval requirement.
textTemplates.name: bodyEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Your request for {!varLocationId} on {!varDateRequested} for slot {!varSlotRequested} has been accepted.


Please keep this email or the mobile up to complete the check-in process.


Your QRCode:


{!Get_Request.QR_Code__c}

textTemplates.description: Text used when the user choose a wrong location
textTemplates.name: showInfoOnError
textTemplates.text:
We apologize for the error. Something went wrong with this flow.
Your admin has received an email about this error and will take care of it.

textTemplates.description: This subject is used when an email should be send after a request has been approved WITHOUT manager approval requirement.
textTemplates.name: subjectEmailTemplate

variables.description: Email of the user requesting access to office.
variables.name: varUserEmail
